title: Sales of streaming devices in the United States 2014
summary: This bar chart has 6 categories for the x axis representing Streaming Brand, and a y axis representing Unit sales in millions.
The highest category is found at Apple_TV where Unit sales in millions is 8.8.
The lowest category is found at Tivo where Unit sales in millions is 1.2.
gold: The statistic shows the unit sales of streaming devices in the United States in 2014 . 8.8 million units of the Apple TV streaming device are forecast to be sold in the United States in 2014 .
